description: Built for all-season alpine use, the Microgravity is OR's most versatile and protective AscentShell™ 3L jacket. Thoughtful features and lightweight, sturdy, mechanical stretch fabric provide protection and comfort on rainy trails, stormy summits, and snowy skin tracks.
name: Outdoor Research MicroGravity AscentShell Jacket - Mens

specs.value: AscentShell™ 3L, 100% Nylon 20D X 45D Mechanical Stretch Ripstop with 100% Polyester 30D Knit Backer
